macro lens mod

Inspired by this article, I'm experimenting with external lenses for my iPhone 4S.

first attempt

I ripped this part from a broken point-and-shoot camera and superglued it to a strong magnet for easy attachment. It focuses very close, but has ridiculously shallow depth-of-field and considerable distortion at the edges.



photos

Unedited photos taken with the lens.
